description: Detects Netsh command execution that whitelists a program located in a suspicious location in the Windows Firewall
author: Sander Wiebing
Jonhnathan Ribeiro
Daniil Yugoslavskiy
oscd.community
name: Suspicious Program Location Whitelisted In Firewall Via Netsh.EXE
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\netsh.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"netsh.exe")) AND (((process.command_line.text:"*firewall*" AND process.command_line.text:"*add*" AND process.command_line.text:"*allowedprogram*")) OR ((process.command_line.text:"*advfirewall*" AND process.command_line.text:"*firewall*" AND process.command_line.text:"*add*" AND process.command_line.text:"*rule*" AND process.command_line.text:"*action\=allow*" AND process.command_line.text:"*program\=*"))) AND process.command_line.text:("*%Public%\\*" OR "*%TEMP%*" OR "*%TMP%*" OR "*\:\\$Recycle.bin\\*" OR "*\:\\RECYCLER\\*" OR "*\:\\SystemVolumeInformation\\*" OR "*\:\\Temp\\*" OR "*\:\\Users\\Default\\*" OR "*\:\\Users\\Desktop\\*" OR "*\:\\Users\\Public\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\addins\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\cursors\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\debug\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\drivers\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\fonts\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\help\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\system32\\tasks\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\Tasks\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\Temp\\*" OR "*\\Downloads\\*" OR "*\\Local\ Settings\\Temporary\ Internet\ Files\\*" OR "*\\Temporary\ Internet\ Files\\Content.Outlook\\*"))
